title: Introduction
discription: The Web NFC API allows web applications to interact with NFC (Near Field Communication) tags. It's a powerful tool for bridging the gap between the physical and digital worlds, right from a browser. This guide provides the technical details and code snippets you need to get started.
content:
Introduction

The Web NFC API allows web applications to interact with NFC (Near Field Communication) tags. It's a powerful tool for bridging the gap between the physical and digital worlds, right from a browser. This guide provides the technical details and code snippets you need to get started.
